mapper.select: select cgseq, cgAnotherseq, cgName, cgNameEng, cgUseNy, cgNum, cgExplanation, cgDelNy from codegroup where 1=1 and cgdelNy = 0 order by cgseq desc
mapper.insert:
insert into codegroup (
cgAnotherseq, cgName, cgNameEng, cgUseNy, cgNum, cgExplanation, cgDelNy ) values (
#{cgAnotherseq}, #{cgName}, #{cgNameEng}, #{cgUseNy}, #{cgNum}, #{cgExplanation}, 0 )
SELECT last_insert_id()
